backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining user profiles, vehicles, notifications, activation tokens, and permission helpers with integrated authorization, storage, and invite modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend files and components.
frontend/.eslintrc.cjs: ESLint configuration enabling TypeScript, React, and hooks rules with project-specific warnings and ignore patterns.
frontend/.prettierrc.json: Prettier configuration specifying formatting rules such as semicolons, print width, and quote style.
frontend/CHANGE_CONTROL_POLICY.md: Defines strict change-control rules for routes, authentication, backend APIs, and review requirements.
frontend/CHANGELOG.md: Project changelog documenting version history, routes, and protected interfaces for the initial 1.0.0 release.
frontend/ci-run-gates.sh: Shell script that runs the frontend quality gates via npm.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, theming variables, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Defines the base HTML document for the React app, including PWA metadata and bootstrapping the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/PR_CHECKLIST.md: Pull request checklist enforcing change-control, testing, documentation, and quality-gate requirements.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and categories for Pasar Digital Community.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching rules with network-first for HTML and cache-first for static assets, plus versioned cache cleanup.
frontend/QUALITY_GATES.md: Documentation describing the automated quality-gate system and how to run it.
frontend/README_CHANGE_CONTROL.md: Guide explaining how to apply the project's change-control system during development.
frontend/README_VERSIONING.md: Documentation outlining semantic versioning rules used by the project.
frontend/src/__tests__/router-smoke.test: Empty test file placeholder for router smoke tests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and a full TanStack Router route tree for all app pages including admin routes.
frontend/src/components/activation/Vehic: UI card allowing users to view activation status and redeem vehicle registration activation tokens.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied message with a return button and admin info for restricted pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Error screen shown when profile loading fails, with backend health checks, error classification, and retry/copy options.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Sign‑in screen enabling Internet Identity login with branding and feature explanations.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupBoot: Error screen handling startup failures with retry logic, error copy, and backend health checks.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Renders the application logo at configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSwi: Empty placeholder file for a language switcher component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout showing header, content, and footer based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Dialog for reporting a vehicle as lost, stolen, or pawned with validation and submission.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Dialog to submit a found-vehicle report with user‑entered details.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Top navigation bar with user menu, navigation links, admin access, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/system/TopLevelE: React error boundary that catches top‑level errors and renders a fallback UI.
Fallback UI displaying an app error message and reload option.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Component to initiate vehicle ownership transfer using a PIN and display the generated transfer code.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: PIN entry dialog with validation, error display, and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/vehicle/VehicleP: Displays a vehicle photo with fallback UI if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrapStat: Tracks actor bootstrap errors and manages automatic and continuous retry logic with timing feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides admin-related queries and mutations like privilege checks, invite code management, and system stats.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Checks backend reachability anonymously and returns basic diagnostics data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, and logout via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Fetches lost vehicles and provides mutations to mark vehicles lost or found with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Fetches user notifications and allows marking them as read with periodic polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Handles onboarding completion with detailed logging and error normalization, updating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Provides React Query hooks to check, set up, and update a user's PIN via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Defines hooks to fetch and update the caller's user profile using the actor API with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Adds hooks for initiating and accepting vehicle ownership transfers and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleCheck.ts: Exposes a mutation hook to check vehicle status using an engine number via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleRegistratio: Implements hooks for checking activation status and redeeming activation tokens for vehicle registration.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Provides hooks to fetch user vehicles, fetch a specific vehicle, register a vehicle, and revoke ownership.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Empty file placeholder for i18n initialization.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the i18n provider component.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/ar.ts: Empty file placeholder for Arabic language definitions.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/en.ts: Empty file placeholder for English language definitions.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/id.ts: Empty file placeholder for Indonesian language definitions.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/zh-Hans.ts: Empty file placeholder for Simplified Chinese language definitions.
frontend/src/i18n/storage.ts: Empty file placeholder for i18n storage utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/__tests__/VehiclesPag: Test file placeholder with no content provided.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an informational About page describing the app, features, and admin contact details.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Implements the UI and logic for accepting a vehicle transfer using a transfer code.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard page that verifies admin access, fetches system stats, handles loading and error states, and displays summary cards for vehicles and users.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Admin interface for generating activation tokens, validating principals, copying tokens or instructions, and handling admin access states.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user dashboard stats and quick actions based on vehicles and notifications.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Displays a searchable list of lost, stolen, or pawned vehicles with status badges and report details.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows user notifications and allows marking them as read with timestamp formatting.
Empty page placeholder for onboarding via invite.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Handles user onboarding, including admin-claim logic and profile submission.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Provides profile viewing/editing, logout, and PIN setup/update functionality.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Form to register a new vehicle with photo upload and activation checks.
frontend/src/pages/ReportFoundVehiclePag: Searches a vehicle by engine number and allows reporting found vehicles based on status.
frontend/src/pages/RevokeOwnershipPage.t: Page allowing users to revoke ownership of active vehicles with PIN confirmation and navigation after success.
Page for creating and updating a security PIN with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleCheckPage.tsx: Vehicle status lookup by engine number with status badges, alerts, and optional found-report dialog.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed vehicle info, status, and allows PIN‑gated ownership revocation for owners.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Lists user vehicles with status badges and provides registration or activation actions.
frontend/src/routes/__tests__/RootRouteG: Empty test file placeholder for RootRouteGate.
frontend/src/routes/RootRouteGate.tsx: Top‑level route gate that manages authentication, profile loading, bootstrap error handling, retries, and onboarding redirects.
frontend/src/utils/__tests__/bootstrapEr: Empty test file placeholder for bootstrap error utilities.
frontend/src/utils/actorProxy.ts: Creates a safe proxy wrapper around backend actors to gracefully handle admin access initialization and avoid startup failures.
frontend/src/utils/actorQueryKey.ts: Provides a shared function to generate consistent React Query keys for actor queries.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Defines and checks a client‑side allowlist of admin principals and exposes retrieval of the list.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapError.ts: Classifies bootstrap errors, detects stopped‑canister conditions, extracts technical details, and provides user guidance.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeActorError.t: Normalizes backend actor errors into user‑friendly messages with categorized error types and context‑aware handling.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingTroubleshoo: Empty utility file placeholder for onboarding troubleshooting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL and hash params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing them from the hash.
frontend/src/version.ts: Defines the app’s version and build timestamp constants.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, known issues, and current state for a vehicle management app.
